problem_definition.command_line:
fluidity darcy_p0p1_test_cty_cv_pressBCinlet_2d.flml fluidity advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_2d.flml
fluidity darcy_p0p1_test_cty_cv_pressBCinlet_3d.flml fluidity advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_3d.flml

variables.variable: from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_cons_imp_2d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_2d.stat")["fluid"]["Tracer"]["integral"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_tracer_cons_imp_2d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_2d.stat")["fluid"]["Tracer"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat min_tracer_cons_imp_2d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_2d.stat")["fluid"]["Tracer"]["min"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_2d.stat")["fluid"]["CFLNumber"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_2d.stat")["fluid"]["InterstitialVelocityCGCourantNumber"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_cons_imp_3d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_3d.stat")["fluid"]["Tracer"]["integral"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_tracer_cons_imp_3d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_3d.stat")["fluid"]["Tracer"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat min_tracer_cons_imp_3d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_3d.stat")["fluid"]["Tracer"]["min"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_3d.stat")["fluid"]["CFLNumber"]["max"][-1]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d = stat("advect_tracer_cons_imp_p1cg_3d.stat")["fluid"]["InterstitialVelocityCGCourantNumber"]["max"][-1]

test.name: change_P for 2D should equal domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm, check relative difference to be under tolerance 5.0e-08

pass_tests.test: change_P = abs(max(pressure_2d) - min(pressure_2d)) visc = 1.0e-04 vel_BC = 10.0 phi = 0.5 perm = 1.0e-10 domain_length = 300.0 print 'Analytic pressure difference: ',domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((change_P - domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)/(domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)) assert abs((change_P - domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)/(domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)) < 5.0e-08

test.name: Darcy velocity for 2d should equal 5.0, check relative difference to be under tolerance 5.0e-08

pass_tests.test: analytic_vel = 5.0 print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((vel_2d - analytic_vel)/analytic_vel) assert abs((vel_2d - analytic_vel)/analytic_vel) < 5.0e-08

test.name: Integral of tracer_cons_imp for 2d at half way through domain, check with tolerance 2.0e-02

pass_tests.test: analytic_int = 45000 print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((integral_tracer_cons_imp_2d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) assert abs((integral_tracer_cons_imp_2d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) < 2.0e-02

test.name: Max of tracer_cons_imp for 2d should be 1.0, check with tolerance 4.0e-03

pass_tests.test: analytic_int = 1.0 print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((max_tracer_cons_imp_2d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) assert abs((max_tracer_cons_imp_2d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) < 4.0e-03

test.name: Min of tracer_cons_imp for 2d should be 0.0, check with tolerance 4.0e-03

pass_tests.test: analytic_int = 0.0 print 'Solution absolute error: ',abs(min_tracer_cons_imp_2d - analytic_int) assert abs(min_tracer_cons_imp_2d - analytic_int) < 4.0e-03

test.name: max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d = max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d / porosity, check with tolerance 1.0e-08

pass_tests.test: porosity = 0.5 print 'Solution absolute error: ',abs(max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d - (max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d / porosity)) assert abs(max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d - (max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_2d / porosity)) < 1.0e-08

test.name: change_P for 3D should equal domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm, check relative difference to be under tolerance 5.0e-08

pass_tests.test: change_P = abs(max(pressure_3d) - min(pressure_3d)) visc = 1.0e-04 vel_BC = 10.0 phi = 0.5 perm = 1.0e-10 domain_length = 300.0 print 'Analytic pressure difference: ',domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((change_P - domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)/(domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)) assert abs((change_P - domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)/(domain_length*visc*phi*vel_BC/perm)) < 5.0e-08

test.name: Darcy velocity for 3d should equal 5.0, check relative difference to be under tolerance 5.0e-08

pass_tests.test: analytic_vel = 5.0 print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((vel_3d - analytic_vel)/analytic_vel) assert abs((vel_3d - analytic_vel)/analytic_vel) < 5.0e-08

test.name: Integral of tracer_cons_imp for 3d at half way through domain, check with tolerance 2.0e-02

pass_tests.test: analytic_int = 45000*300 print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((integral_tracer_cons_imp_3d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) assert abs((integral_tracer_cons_imp_3d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) < 2.0e-02

test.name: Max of tracer_cons_imp for 3d should be 1.0, check with tolerance 4.0e-03

pass_tests.test: analytic_int = 1.0 print 'Solution relative error: ',abs((max_tracer_cons_imp_3d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) assert abs((max_tracer_cons_imp_3d - analytic_int)/analytic_int) < 4.0e-03

test.name: Min of tracer_cons_imp_upwind for 3d should be 0.0, check with tolerance 4.0e-03

pass_tests.test: analytic_int = 0.0 print 'Solution absolute error: ',abs(min_tracer_cons_imp_3d - analytic_int) assert abs(min_tracer_cons_imp_3d - analytic_int) < 4.0e-03

test.name: max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d = max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d / porosity, check with tolerance 1.0e-08

pass_tests.test: porosity = 0.5 print 'Solution absolute error: ',abs(max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d - (max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d / porosity)) assert abs(max_interstitial_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d - (max_darcy_cg_courant_cons_imp_3d / porosity)) < 1.0e-08
